index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
SEATTLE KING COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Program establishing 1991 expenditure allowances for certain youth, emergency shelter, food, employment, advocacy, medical services, and community services in the 1991 budgets of the Department of Human Services, the Human Services Strategic Planning Office, the Department of Community Development, and the Seattle-King County Department of Public Health by the reduction, reappropriation, and transfer of amounts previously appropriated in the 1991 budget.
